title: Q & A February 2020 - Part 2: Community vs. Social Media, Jesus People, L'Abri, Angels and Demons
description:
Here is the second part of the Q & A for February 2020. The questions were excellent. So I had to split it in two. In this one I spend a while discussing the possibility of community in a highly mediated age. Also I discuss the possible reality of angels and demons. We'll do this again in March. Thanks for asking and listening to this. 

Part one  of the February Q & A is here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=SaDBhnVfz0I Mediated / Unmediated Lecture - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Hj76WwkerTQ
SUPPORT THIS CHANNEL. Please consider a monthly contribution through PayPal to receive extra content and to help me from financially crashing here in Georgia. And if you start today you can get 7 hours worth of extra content immediately. 

Click this...  https://www.paypal.com/cgi-bin/webscr?cmd=_s-xclick&hosted_button_id=G9LDYMSPZ5RGG
Watch this video for more about our extra content:https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nykTp3TziRY

My other YouTube channel is this one: https://www.youtube.com/user/gulagzero 

The Anadromous Life essay site for more in depth ideas: https://theanadromist.wordpress.com/ 

The Gravity From Above site for more artistic ideas involving puppetry, music, dance and other arts. 

https://gravityfromabove.wordpress.com/ 

And if you want to communicate with me use The Anadromous Life Facebook page. https://www.facebook.com/theanadromist/ 

(I don't want to have to make my personal page private because I have too many 'friends'. If it's dialogue you want go there. I'll start 'community' page soon enough if the demand is there.) 

Thanks for watching, more coming soon! 

Meanwhile dig into the Anadromous past. Swim against the stream my friends. 

From Tbilisi Georgia (Look it up on a map!) Byrne

#community #media #demons #jesuspeople
